BathroomMirror: ^<color=#ffffffff>You walk up to the bathroom mirror, it looks old with some chips.
^<color=#ffffffff>A corner of it looks ready to fall off... It might be possible to pluck it yourself.
^<color=#ffffffff>If you are careful, you could use the mirror shard to rip the manga book up?
YesDestroy: ^<color=#ffffffff>Making your way to the crack in the mirror, you carefully put your fingers to the edge.
^<color=#ffffffff>You don't want to fling the shard into your eye, so being extra careful was necessary.
^<color=#ffffffff>With a few weak pries, you managed to take the shard from it's original place.
^<color=#ffffffff>Carefully, you bring the shard up to the first book, stabbing it through the cover before repeating the process.
^<color=#ffffffff>The edge of destroying something that didn't belong to you felt nice that you may have gone a bit overboard.
^<color=#ffffffff>But that's okay, it's looks more purposeful then an accident now.
^<color=#ffffffff>You repeat the process to the other books, the shard going blunt once you were done.
^<color=#ffffffff>You have successfully acquired three ripped Manga books!
